author: trawick
msg: tweak the check for APR_HAS_THREADS so we pick up the symbol before
including private APR header files which assume it

author: rbb
msg: Add condition variables to the APR set of locking functions.
This does Unix, and provides stubs for all other platforms.

author: trawick
msg: Don't search for IPv6 names in apr_sockaddr_info_get() if the
application doesn't specify the family (i.e., the application
passes in AF_UNSPEC) and APR isn't built with IPv6 support.
